imdb.plot outline: WHAT IT IS: Audio Alley is a half-hour sitcom based on the behind-the-scenes (mis)adventures of a tight team working at loose ends to make a small recording studio a huge success. WHAT IT'S ABOUT: Camaraderie. Complications. Craziness. The ups and downs of running a boutique audio production house in a major market. The wacky interplay between an ambitious studio manager (Lynn), a laid-back engineer (Dave), a flighty marketing director (Katie), an obsessive-compulsive session player (Richard), and a gloomy, neo-goth receptionist (Caligo) as they work together on doing whatever it takes to land clients, build the business, and insure their reputations as recording industry heavyweights - each in their own weird ways, of course. A steady stream of interns that never quite work out are there to lend a hand. Can these peculiar personalities pull themselves together to make a go of it?
imdb.title: Audio Alley
